basic.description: This course, taken in conjunction with student teaching, documents student progress in mastering the 12 Accomplished Practices by preparing professional portfolios for both the elementary and secondary art teaching levels.
basic.subject: ARE
basic.title: Portfolio in Art Education

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ARE 4042, ARE 4043, ARE 4144 and ARE 4550C. Corequisite: ARE 4940.
